Reviews.Title: “Very close to train station and value for money (for Venice)”
Reviews.Author: 5murrell
Reviews.Content: stayed close train station ferry terminal check neighbouring hotel unattended breakfast door offer dining facilities reception efficient smile friendliness floor modern en suite bathroom hotel looked refurbished recently breakfast door adequate poor little choice uninteresting food pay credit card cash communications link judging litter equipment suspect pretty standard excuse stop taking credit cards overall hotel represents value money venice

Reviews.Content: booked note door directed friend people reception nice friendly top floor elevator meant dragging suitcases ourselves bathroom nice clean cleaned daily fresh towels left daily decent shower heater bathroom italian channels tv obviously breakfast brought morning mornings ate breakfast served eggs tea coffee cereals breads fruit filling location close train station main bus station venice lots eat nearby supermarket 10 minutes walk nice stay value money location
